content:
A sign is held up during a picket walk at the teacher walkout April   PERIOD

Norman Public School district has canceled classes for April  and  as teacher walkouts continue for the second week at the Oklahoma Capitol PERIOD

The cancelations mark the eighth and ninth days in a row that the district has been too short on staffing to hold classes PERIOD NPS superintendent Nick Migliorino said it is a  but that he understands teachers passion for the cause of the walkouts which have been going on since April  PERIOD

Oklahoma City Public Schools has also canceled classes for April  PERIOD The state is extendingstandardized testing deadlinesto April 27to accommodate school cancelations PERIOD

NPSs announcement includestimes and dates for free meals and childcare resources throughout the Norman community PERIOD NPS and OKCPS are each working on plans for makeup days since school cancelations have used the districts inclement weather days according to the announcement PERIOD

title: Norman Public Schools cancels classes April 11, 12 as teacher walkout continues | News | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
